summary: Raja, a taxi driver, falls in love with Aarti, a rich girl, and marries her against her parents' wishes. Later, her parents try to create differences amongst the couple.
cast: Aamir Khan|Karisma Kapoor|Suresh Oberoi|Johnny Lever|Navneet Nishan|Veeru Krishnan|Kunal Khemu|Pramod Moutho|Mohnish Bahl|Tiku Talsania|Farida Jalal|Archana Puran Singh|Kalpana Iyer|Pratibha Sinha|Shravan Sagar|Razak Khan
keywords: love|taxi driver|red dress|stepmother|poor man rich woman
title: Raja Hindustani
